name: Wildlife Park 2 - Dino World
description: Exciting and thrilling dinosaur-extension for the Wildlife Park univers with 11 different dinosaurs in 9 new missions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/8/7 Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2 GHz or compatible Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9c compatible, 64 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3000 MB available space Additional Notes: ATTENTION: Does not work with any Wildlife Park 2 Retail Versions

reviews.review_text: A pretty nice expansion pack/DLC although,the dinosaur choice is kind of meh because they only have ten dinosaurs and one giant turtle called archelon. The upside to the DLC is the missions, the missions were actually fun ecspecially the one where you had to rescue the dinosaurs from the military. All in all this is a great expansion pack for an awesome game (even though there isn't alot to it).

I keep getting stuck behind landscaping when in mission mode, there is no way to back yourself out. Keep needing to restart the game and try to find a different route - it's very frustrating for what should be a fun casual game. I'm really disappointed that I spent my money on this.
This isn't even worth the $3 I spent.
